value.title: Microsoft announces auto-generated captions for images in Edge
value.excerpt: Microsoft uses Azure Cognitive Services to analyze and describe pictures with missing "alt text." When Edge detects an unlabeled image, it sends it to Microsoft's servers for processing.

value.title: Microsoft Edge Can Now Generate Image Descriptions for Screen Readers
value.excerpt: Microsoft Edge is now capable of generating automatic images descriptions for users browsing the web with screen readers. The accessibility feature uses Azure Cognitive Services intelligence to generate alt text for web images that do not include it.
